name: conciliation
content:
Add to word list

the action or process of ending a disagreement, often by discussion between the groups or people involved: All attempts at conciliation failed and the dispute continued. He prefers compromise and conciliation to confrontation. See
conciliate
More examplesFewer examplesThe commission has not entered into a conciliation agreement.This country's industrial relations system is based on compulsory conciliation.Where a complaint cannot be resolved by conciliation, you can take your complaint to the Federal Court.
